entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mildred Lake 08:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 14.2°C
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Smoke. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Widespread smoke. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 70 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Widespread smoke. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
